node.title: message_outbox
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `message_outbox` ( `message_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `msgtext` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `author_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tstamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `archive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`), KEY `tstamp_index` (`tstamp`), KEY `author_user_archive_messageid` (`author_user`,`archive`,`message_id`), KEY `author_user_tstamp` (`author_user`,`tstamp`), KEY `author_user_archive_tstamp` (`author_user`,`archive`,`tstamp`), KEY `message_author` (`author_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
